text: Valerie "Val" Muriel Jellay (25 September 1927 â€“ 6 May 2017) was an Australian actress, soubrette, singer, dancer and author. She also appeared in Prisoner as Mabel Morgan, and in Neighbours as Connie O'Rourke. She appeared in many guest roles in Australian soap operas. Jellay died in Sydney from pneumonia on 6 May 2017 at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Actors from Sydney
title: Val Jellay
